website_summaries.verdict: A good alternative to candles in glass jars, plus it has some nice features, but the trade-off is the very mild scent and short burn time.
pros: Produces a relaxing lavender scent and burns cleanly - no reports of soot or smoke
Made of soy wax produced by eco-friendly soybeans
cons: The scent may be too mild for some consumers
Doesn't burn as long as others of similar size

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I know you’ll probably disregard my review and one star, but if you’re like me and you are particular about your candles being mostly natural/soy, and prefer a true fall scent, then read on! I found two better priced soy candles, one from Target for $5 (favorite pumpkin scent yet), and this one today while shopping at Trader Joe’s (right) Trust me, I’m the pumpkin-candle connoisseur, and if you buy the Wax Oils one you may not feel good about it for $13. My sniffer picked up smells of sugary maple more than spicy pumpkin. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: JA&KA

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for Great Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I don't even like Lavender, but this is just the most awesome smelling thing. Its so soothing. I actually don't light these. I use a warming plate because I like for this to produce a fragrance while I sleep and I'm too afraid to sleep with a flame burning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon A Holic

customer_reviews.title: Smells like fresh brewed coffee
customer_reviews.text: I am a sucker for candles that smell like coffee, but I always feel like there is some chemical or weird smell to them. Not with this candle. This smells exactly like you just brewed a fresh pot of coffee or espresso and it is amazing. lasts a very long time. They say that it has a 20 hour lifespan, but I have been burning it for at least four days straight, and it is only about 2/3 of the way gone.
customer_reviews.author: Glitter Fallout

customer_reviews.title: I Will Never Buy Another Yankee Candle
customer_reviews.text: These candles are quite possibly my most favorite that I have ever come across. These are high quality, wonderfully scented, but are not overpowering and will not give you a headache. I love these candles so much that I have started sending them to my relatives as gifts. I will never buy another Yankee candle ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Camino

customer_reviews.title: You like pine trees?
customer_reviews.text: Because this smells very much like an evergreen/pine tree. It's quite potent and you can tell when you first open the tin it comes in. I feel like I'm sort of picky about what 'pine tree' smells I enjoy, so buying this off amazon and not in person was a small gamble. It was well worth it, it's probably the best smelling I've had out of about 5 other products. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these candles is wonderful. Very cool metal container with lid. Burns evenly and for HOURS! Handy laminated instruction card included to teach you about "wick maintenance". Who knew there was a right and wrong way to maintain your wick? The smell is great, subtly permeating my whole office, creating a wonderfully warm and relaxing atmosphere. This is a very classy product from a very classy company. Even the packaging is brilliant. I can't recommend the whole enterprise highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carol

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these candles! I bought myself a vanilla and then sent one to my sister. Smells so good burning! Burns very clean. Check them out on Facebook, I won a pumpkin candle and omg it smells fantastic! I keep it on my desk unlit and it fills the whole room out in to the hallway. Very sweet with hints of pumpkin spice
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey C

customer_reviews.title: Lit on fire?!
customer_reviews.text: ENTIRE product(yes including the tin) caught on fire after 30 minutes of burning. Not very scented. Had another candle from Grove Collaborative, same scent, smaller in size and was much more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Madsen

customer_reviews.title: This candle smells amazing, just like egg nog.
customer_reviews.text: Strong egg nog scent, these candles burn clean and for about 22-24 hours of use. These candles make a wonderful gift and are a Christmas tradition at our house. I love candles and have used many different brands i would rank these candles in the top 3 as far as price, scent strength/authenticity, and ingredients. I highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlight

customer_reviews.title: Constant Smoke
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this candle. It has a nice scent that spreads through the room. However I can’t actually recommend this candle because it creates SO MUCH smoke when lit. See video. It is constant. I trim the wick before use and still it continuously lets out puffs of smoke. I’ve never experienced this with a candle before and I feel unsafe using it and so will be throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Just like the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t review- but hear me out. This candle was so easy to start- crazy fast. I love lemons, I add fresh lemon juice to my water every morning. This soy based candle smells so fresh. Within 6mins I can smell it all over the living room and kitchen. I’ve only burned it twice- so I don’t know how long it really last. I highly recommend though. Specially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have item
customer_reviews.text: I love these wax oil massage candles and will definitely purchase more. This is the second one that I have purchased, the other was lavender. For massage, I personally preferred the lavender one strictly based on scent as the consistency is the same. However, this peppermint and eucalyptus candle is fragrant and makes the room smell great especially now during the winter time. The wax does melt quickly, so I would recommend only lighting the candle shortly before you plan on using it. This is a better quality candle at a fraction of a price I had paid for other products.
customer_reviews.author: TheScarletSentiment

customer_reviews.title: Quality over quantity
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells amazing. Going to re-order. Great for smoke and pet odor. I let this candle burn for about 20 mins and it emits a very strong scent in large rooms. Its small for the price but you save in quality...worth it
customer_reviews.author: FIYA KAT

customer_reviews.title: Decent if you are looking for non-toxic option
customer_reviews.text: This is just ugly packaging. I would never give as a gift. The scent was very mild, too mild for my taste but it smells nice. It burns evenly. II appreciate that this candle has no toxins, which is why I purchased it. I don't like candles in a tin, there is not that pretty glow, so won't buy again. (Total candle snob here!)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Burns itself out
customer_reviews.text: Lovely scent, but you have to continually pour out wax (which makes a mess everywhere) if you want it to keep burning. It's a shame and a waste. I bought two and I don't even think I'll use the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Best candles ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my all time favorite candles. I can't get enough. They don't smoke up, they last a really long time (although I tend to keep them burning all day when I'm home) and they smell amazing! I can't buy candles from any other company anymore, I'm totally spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product! I really wanted an orange scented candle, but this is not it. Before lighting it, I smelled it and didn’t sell orange at all. It actually smelt a little gross, but I figured maybe it would smell better when lit. It didn’t. In fact, I couldn’t smell it at all until I was about a foot away and it did NOT smell like orange. I’d be much happier spending $14 more and getting the Fresh orange candle from Bath and Body Works
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Pure lemon fragrance that is subtle
customer_reviews.text: Pure lemon scent but not strong enough to scent an open floor plan living area like the Yankee Candle Lemon that is no longer made. The scent of the Wax & Oils candle burns a pure lemon however. Great for diminishing cooking odors. I think the company needs to make the scent stronger.
customer_reviews.author: LindaKTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: I love these candles!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of their candles in different scents. I have not been disappointed with any of them. They don't over power the air with a perfume smell as other candles.. No toxic fumes floating in my home. First candles I've used that don't give me a headache from the smell. They may seem a bit high in price but trust me..they are worth every penny!.
customer_reviews.author: Anita in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Fragrant and lovely!
customer_reviews.text: The Evergreen candle smells just like my Christmas tree and brings the pine scent into my kitchen from the living room. The candle burns well and is in a lovely little holder. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing! Not too strong !
customer_reviews.text: This candle is simply amazing! I’m very sensitive to scents and was worried it might be too strong or have a fake smell to it. This smells like pure lavender oils and is very light! It’s the perfect candle to burn while trying to relax or even just to have on to make the house a little calmer. It goes quickly though. Picture is of having candle burn for the 4th night for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Alysa

customer_reviews.title: Nice scented candle
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this candle. A lot of scents really bother my nose, and I start sneezing and get clogged up. this is a nice light scent of Vanilla and doesnt bother me. Would absolutely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gerstyd

customer_reviews.title: Natural wax candle
customer_reviews.text: This a great candle, and smells amazing (I purchased the Apple Cider candle), however, it may have just been my nose, but I felt like when we lit the candle, the primary smell I noticed as the smell of burning, rather than the scent of the candle. I'm hoping this isn't the case every time I light it, but if so it will definitely be a deal-breaker for me. Otherwise, I was very grateful to find such a yummy-scented candle that my husband likes the smell of and that doesn't give me a headache from the artificial fragrence.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Summers

customer_reviews.title: Burn was fine, but no smell
customer_reviews.text: I got the Sandalwood and I'm mixed about it. It burned fine, evenly, and lasted about as long as advertised -- 22 to 25 hours burning about 2 hrs at a time. But there was no detectable Sandalwood fragrance, whether burning or not. In fact I couldn't detect any fragrance from the candle except the normal smell of a burning candle. So that was disappointing. Wouldn't order another.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Boy

customer_reviews.title: My MIL loves them,
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my MIL to use during the holidays at her house instead of her synthetic paraffin wax ones as we have a young baby and care about air quality. She really likes them and is looking forward to using them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This candle smells like delicious spice cookies when lit
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells like delicious spice cookies when lit, with a subtle pumpkin hint. I love it because it makes the house smell like fresh holiday cookies just came out of the oven. The wicks on these candles work best for me when I use a wick trimmer and not scissors, like I can get away with using on my other candles. I trim them to 1/4” before each use, even before the 1st time I light them. They burn nice and slow and I’m very impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell but won’t stay lit ! !
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for how incredible it smells ! ! It makes the entire room smell so good and it’s the perfect pumpkin scent ! ! But it will not stay lit . Every time I light it , a few moments later it is no longer lit . No windows open and no fan . The flame just gets smaller and smaller and then stops
customer_reviews.author: Lil' Princess :D

customer_reviews.title: Great little candle
customer_reviews.text: These folks are definitely intent on building a brand. The candle came in high quality packaging and was beautifully presented. These are the kind of details I appreciate. I read some of the other reviews about the strength of the scent. It is very important that you place this little candle in an appropriately sized room. I buy candles for the relaxing scents. In the right space this candle is great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Different Scent
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered a couple months ago smelled lovely. So I ordered another. It was not the same. They should change the name if they change the smell. I was very disappointed to get a different candle than the one I ordered not too long ago, especially since I liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: M41

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth a repurchase!
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells so delicious. It reminds me of Demeter's "Cake Batter" fragrance, as it's deliciously sweet and food-like. Definitely a perfect sweet, vanilla scent in my opinion. The candle is very strong smelling even before lighting it and it does a really good job of smelling up my house. I'm always worried candles won't have enough scent power in them and this one did not disappoint. Plus, I love that it's soy based.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Hailand

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, Ok Quality
customer_reviews.text: I think $12 is way too overpriced for this candle. This would be no more $6 at target. The lavender scent smells like crap, the cucumber-lemon smells alright. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MOTA

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...does not live up to reviews or description
customer_reviews.text: I have been using various types of candles at home and at my workshop for over the last 40 years plus. This candle is by far one of the worst ones I have ever purchased over the decades. We burnt though this candle in less than 10 hours with barely a wiff of Evergreen scent at all and thats even standing directly over the candle. We managed the wick properly the whole short burn time. I will never purchase a candle from this maker ever again. If your looking at purchasing this candle I strongly recommend not purchasing any one of this makers products. If I could leave a zero star review I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it, smells like cinnamon baked goods. Perfect for the fall. Burns even, just like you hope a soy candle would. Not the first candle I've purchased from Wax and Oils and wont be the last.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas b.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my absolute favorite scented candles. The vanilla is so soothing. It fills the room with a warm, beautiful scent. I’m pretty sensitive to many fragrances, but I have never been irritated or given a headache by these. They arrive quickly, last long, and are aesthetically pleasing. I love the wide wooden wick.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Becker

customer_reviews.title: No help for sinus's and no fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: The candle burned rapidly with little or no scent. I bought it hoping to help open my sinus's and it did absolutely nothing. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Apple cider
customer_reviews.text: Regular candle have started making me feel unwell lately, so I've gone to only essential oil candles. I got the apple cider and the cranberry. Cranberry is eh ok. Apple cider is fabulous! I'm ordering a 2nd! My only complaint, is I'd like it to be a bit more affordable. Maybe $10 instead of $13 as it's quite a small candle.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: try this candle!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The seller really turned me around on this product. He sent a replacement candle which turned out to be very lovely indeed--it looks as if some older stock had snuck through, which. although pleasant enough, didn't have the rich scent I was hoping for. The replacement was MUCH better, and the seller even sent me a second candle as an apology. It's rare and highly refreshing to find such a commitment toquality and cutomer satisfaction in today's make-a-quick-buck culture, and I plan to be a regular customer in the future. So for an instant at-home spa experience, pour a glass of wine, draw a warm bath, light up your candle, and relax.
customer_reviews.author: lewes

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn’t burn completely
customer_reviews.text: The scent was amazing but there was some wax left at the bottom that wouldn’t melt because the fire wouldn’t reach it. Basically not too great functional design.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Bizarre
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to light (I gave it a poor review on longevity because I have yet to be able to keep the thing lit). It may be authentic sandalwood but smells nothing like other products I have seen with that name, and is a bit swampy and to me not that pleasant, let alone soothing. The packaging is nice but that doesn't cut a lot of ice.
customer_reviews.author: Mark from Monroe

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEEE!
customer_reviews.text: This candle is PERFECT for a small/medium sized room. It filled my room with fragrance in about an hour. It has a light scent but it's not faint. It's a very warm, calming smell which is exactly what I wanted when picking Lavender. Will definetly buy from this line again!
customer_reviews.author: Eleiren

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't have a really strong smell. It does smell good but I doubt the smell would fill up a room. I purchased this as a gift and I might send it back. Also, I bought two and while they read as different scents, they both smell the same.
customer_reviews.author: WestMo99

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are soy-based and have a thick wick that lasts for a long time and spreads the the scent around. Will definitely buy more of these in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I’m back to buy another lavender candle, and my last one has lasted for 14 months! I’ve used it 1-2 times a week during looonnngggg baths, about an hour each. I love that it’s made from all natural ingredients, and has a wonderful, authentic scent. I’ll keep buying these!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great quality candle but not a strong enough smell
customer_reviews.text: Great quality candle but not a strong enough smell. I like that it doesn't have that chemical smell but the fragrance is a bit too subtle to make it worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: APresto

customer_reviews.title: Hate this candle
customer_reviews.text: Hate this candle! What a waste of money! $11 for a candle that burns the center inch out of the candle, but the rest of the candle is hard wax! seller said it was great but mine sucked and they wouldn't refund my money. So dont waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany A.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful candles!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scent and color! This candle and their whole collection makes such wonderful gifts. I love that it's soy and is made in the U.S.A. These candles are such great quality and you simply can't beat the price! We've purchased the Lavender, Orange, and Vanilla. My favorite is the orange, but the vanilla is so fragrant you don't even have to light it to enjoy it's wonderful fragrance. All the scents smell natural and real. I will definitely be repurchasing this again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kabala

customer_reviews.title: No Scent
customer_reviews.text: I like how it smelled before i lit it, but I couldn't smell anything after it was lit. I smelled a tiny hint of it after leaving the room and coming back in but not much. It also did not last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice candle
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle. If you are looking for a candle that smells like coffee this is a great candle. It fills my house with an amazing smell of coffee and it comes in a tin, so if you want you can reuse it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayle

customer_reviews.title: High quality soy wax candle
customer_reviews.text: These are the best candles for gifting to candle lovers. They are made with soy wax, and they smell so good. The presentation right out of the box is mindful and meditative. Enjoyed by all, and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: ... candle fragrance is not too strong as I usually like my candles and I am lucky because the smoke ...
customer_reviews.text: Well the candle fragrance is not too strong as I usually like my candles and I am lucky because the smoke of the candle for some reason stings my eyes, and the light smell makes me sneeze . Of course this is just me talking. For someone else might be ok
customer_reviews.author: andria

customer_reviews.title: No frsgrance
customer_reviews.text: Very little scent it’s a waste of money we should have stuck to our original but wanted to try a highly scented candle. A joke
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Smelled PLEASANT even BEFORE lit!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! Very relaxing and really, it smelled good and made my work space smell good without even LIGHTING it!! I got compliments on the scent right away and every time someone came in to talk to me in my office, they would feel compelled to pick the candle up and take a whiff! So needless to say, yes, it was that much better when it was lit. A very pleasing scent that was not overpowering. And just the right size too for my office. Will definitely be buying again and I'll be experimenting with other scents!
customer_reviews.author: messenger1217

customer_reviews.title: Great candle!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this candle because I was looking for an alternative and better price on coffee scented candles. This candle smells so yummy coffee!!! Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Janet McVey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love these and I have had the larger size before but this smaller tin doesn’t burn well. Instead of burning a top layer it just burns straight down the center so it won’t last long unless I mess with the wax on the sides. Not worth it for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles. This scent is mild and sweet. Also it doesn't have a bunch of weird ingredients in it like most candles on the market.
customer_reviews.author: lizzybee4

customer_reviews.title: First good nights sleep in a while!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Everyone loves it when they smell it in my room and I got a good nights rest for the first time in a couple days! I’m taking caution with other reviews on here saying it doesn’t last very long so I’ve made sure to blow it out at times. Very nice scented, well made, and very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marco M.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious !
customer_reviews.text: This is a deliciously aromatic candle. It has a robust coffee smell with a flare of what smelt like cinnamon. I absolutely love it. If you like coffee scented candles, this is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Smells great lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: we used this in the room with the cat litter box, old work boots and trash receptacle. Did a great job covering up any funky smells and lasted a lot longer than the candles you buy locally at big box stores!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Railey

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I was having the same problem with the candle only burning right next to the wick, so it was basically wasting. I remembered reading a review about it, so I got a small spoon and smushed it all together again. Messy but it worked. If it weren't for that, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice candle but didn't smell as much as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Was kind of disappointed as the candle didn't smell as much as I had hoped. Candle arrived quickly & was packed well. But overall, I was hoping that the scent would be stronger for the amount paid.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: good candle
customer_reviews.text: this is a good dependable candle with a pleasant lemony scent, in a nice container with lid for easier snuffing.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Smell
customer_reviews.text: We've used an artificial tree since I was a teenager, I use an artificial tree in my place now, and I missed that Christmas tree smell. This candle was great for my small place, didn't overpower the room and smelt like when we'd go to tree farms when I was a kid. It's small, so it doesn't last months like big Bed/Bath candles, but that's why it's 12 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Where's The Scent?
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this candle. No scent at all - certainly not "holiday kitchen"... Unfortunately, I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Love this candle
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle.The vanilla scent is so good! After burning it for a few hours, there was still A LOT left, and without lightening it again I could smell the vanilla odor from a few meters away for the next days. Even better than expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried after reading other reviews that the s ent would be too light or th candle wouldn’t burn well. Neither of these has been a problem- I burn it for a couple of hours at a time and the scent is lovely , the candle burns evenly .
customer_reviews.author: LVWJuly

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling  .. will order again
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling candles. I have ordered several in diff scents..they smell just as you imagine they would.
customer_reviews.author: marti

customer_reviews.title: Smells natural & beautifully packed!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice package with a cute aromatic lavender candle inside. Great gift box! Candle smells natural, nothing artificial and not too strong, just right amount of lavender to drift you to sleep.... Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Almost scentless...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this candle. It smells wonderful upon opening its container, but that’s where it ended. Sadly when the candle is burning you can’t smell the lemongrass scent unless you are right next to it. I’ve been burning it for over 2 hours now and still can only smell it if I stand right beside it. I’m very disappointed that the scent isn’t strong enough. Wouldn’t recommend this product. It will be stored away for any future power outages.
customer_reviews.author: Gyna

customer_reviews.title: Two big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I have never had a candle smell so awesome! The room the following morning after burning the candle in the evening still smelt wonderful! My husband and I loved it so much we already ordered one for a Christmas smell!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: It is good
customer_reviews.text: easy operate and the scent is good and make me relex
customer_reviews.author: May Wong

customer_reviews.title: Zero scent
customer_reviews.text: I think they forgot to scent this candle. I have 4 other scents of this brand of candle and I love them all, they’re amazing. But this one smells like nothing. Literally nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Marie Cantey

customer_reviews.title: Great candle!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOOVE the smell! Total beachy vibes! I wouldn't recommend leaving it burning for more than a 1-3 hours as the candle holder itself gets hot and from previous consumers seems like it can be flammable..
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!  Smells so good
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the candles with the most bang for your buck. The scent is strong without being over powering. It’s hard to find cedar candles that are just right, but these are!
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Reddish Orange Specks
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my soy candle today. Unfortunately I discovered reddish orange specks all around the rim of the candle (photos attached). Other reviews have mentioned this and have said it is mold. I will be returning the candle.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.-Why-So-Serious.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Warm Fall Smells in Our Home
customer_reviews.text: WE LOVE THIS CANDLE! Smells like fall just came into our living room and a bundle of pumpkins and fresh baked treats were just pulled out the the warm oven. Surrounded in the pleasant smell of fall, without being surrounded by the toxins in the paraben candles. Happy candle lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Artificial fragrance used!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle because I thought they used natural essential oils. Unfortunately they do not. The company’s website stated that it can effect the burning of the candle. This is not true. I’ve used many essential oil candles with no wick or burning issues.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend but when I opened the box the wax had melted out of the candle and into the box. I then opened the lid of the candle and it smelled like a dirty cat liter box. It smelled horrid. I ended up throwing it away and getting her a different candle. I had high hopes for this candle but was very disappointed. I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa N.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent but will not fill the room
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the fact that this candle is more natural and the scent was perfect, you'd have thought we had a real Christmas tree in our house! The only minus, was the scent was only noticeable if you were close to the candle; it did not fill the room.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck. Small but do the job!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, these candles are the BEST bang for your buck. Strong scent - in a good way. Nothing overwhelming but definitely do their job. How frustrating is it to spend $25 on a weak candle. The price is unbeatable, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: WEIRD SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this candle. After paying $13 for a lavender candle, I expected it to smell like the freshest most wonderful lavender in the world. The smell is off. I am a lover of all things lavender and I use all natural lavender essential oils in a diffuser and this does NOT smell like the sweet lavender I am used to. The smell is very harsh and not sweet and fragrant at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Arrived melted
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was never able to use this candle as you can see from this photo it arrived melted and the wick was completely covered. It smells great, too bad it was just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ElishaC

customer_reviews.title: Soothing Scent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this candle a few times a week during to get ready for bed. I often toss and turn during the night, but have found that this helps me get to sleep quicker and stay asleep. I light it for about 20 - 30 mins, climb into bed to read a book, and a few minutes later I find myself dozing off. I quickly snuff the candle, and curl up for a restful night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like lemon Pledge
customer_reviews.text: Thus candle has a very strong cloying scent of lemon Pledge from the instant you open the tin. Really very overwhelming. Not a smell I enjoy personally. I was hoping for a more natural lemon scent and this definitely was not that. But if you love the smell of lemon Pledge this is the candle for you.
customer_reviews.author: H.L. Pfister

customer_reviews.title: burns well and had my apartment smelling like lavender and came earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: My candle came with a very deep smell, burns well and had my apartment smelling like lavender and came earlier than expected. I'm extremely pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: P.Bethune

customer_reviews.title: Not enough burning time
customer_reviews.text: I keep candles in all rooms. I like the scent of these candles but wish they lasted longer. It would be nice if sold in larger sizes. I went to reorder these candles and noticed they cost more than when I bought them in Jan 2016 I love the candle but don't find them worth 11.95 now. They burn very quickly. I'm not sure if it is the soy but I'm disappointed. I will search for a alternative
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Cut the wick
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, I dont know why people are saying it smells like ramen. Make sure to cut the wick though, I was burning it with the wick long and the fire got so tall it was actually rather frightening. Scared I was gonna burn my freaking house down.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Huge throw from such a small candle!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! If you like Lemon aroma therapeutic candles, this one's safe and it's very strong with lots of throw. To be honest, I couldn't believe the throw it has. Will buy again, highly recommended for lemon relaxation aroma therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. RL

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fora gift and my daughter swears it was her favorite candle. It was pretty pricey for the small size.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie M

customer_reviews.title: If you love coffee, you’ll love this candle
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase. I love the scent of coffee. Other products have been disappointing. I love this scent! Will be buying more!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t really impressed. I hardly smelled the scent of this candle when I used it. I only liked the package and the container but the smell was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Maha

customer_reviews.title: Quality candle
customer_reviews.text: Quality candle, good fragrance strength. Gave it a 4 instead of a 5 just because it was a little too sweet for me.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. This is my second time ordering them. The fragrance is wonderful. I highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mshelton

customer_reviews.title: Great Candle and Scent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this candle. Smells like lemon and will fill entire house when I put in the kitchen, which is in the middle. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: BongoSadie

customer_reviews.title: very strong smell
customer_reviews.text: This candle has a strong scent but definitely relaxing. I use it when I take showers & the entire bathroom smells like lavender.
customer_reviews.author: pokemonforlife

customer_reviews.title: Currently my favorite candles
customer_reviews.text: These smell wonderful! Sometimes when I want that rich, enveloping scent in a room, I just take off the lid and don't even light the candle. I sent one to my sister and she asked where to buy them because she loved it. Pumpkin is the once scent I've tried, but I'm going to get some other for the Holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Packrat TendenciesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Mild, very mild
customer_reviews.text: Just not much scent. Might be ok in a small room like a bathroom, but in no way fills the house like my other candle.
customer_reviews.author: RHS

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Big fan! Candle smells great and i get the feeling that it will last a long time. A lot of scented candles will burn away fairly quickly but after having this one lit all day yesterday you can barely tell it has been used. I will definitely be buying more candles from these folks
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Strong, clean scent fills the room quickly
customer_reviews.text: Pretty gift and marvelous scent that fills a room quickly--no need to burn the candle for hours. I'll definitely be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Peske

customer_reviews.title: Could not detect any cedar scent
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that I could not smell any cedar odor upon burning this candle. I will continue searching.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Wick burns black smoke
customer_reviews.text: The wick of this candle burns extremely quickly and it burns a nasty black smoke into the air I am extremely disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: Regina Kay

product_meta.title: Wax and Oils Soy Wax Aromatherapy Scented Candles (Lavender) 8 Ounces. Single
feature_bullets: LAVENDER 8oz - Both Floral and herbaceous, our Lavender is a bright Provence Lavender with a few accent notes, including a subtle Cedarwood and Patchouli to boost its complexity and performance. Lavender is one the most versatile fragrances used in Aromatherapy. It relaxes, as well as, rejuvenates and inspires. It is key to stress and tension elimination. Fragrance infused with natural essential oils including Lavender.

HANDMADE IN THE USA - with Soy Wax and Cotton Core Wicks.  Each candle is hand poured with only premium Wax & Oils.  Our candles are 100% Soy based. They do not contain paraffin, petroleum, animal or beeswax products.

ECO-FRIENDLY - Wax & Oil candles are free from any harmful chemicals or additives. They contain NO pesticides, NO herbicides, and NO genetically modified materials.  Our Packaging is 100% recyclable and the foam inserts are made from 65% recycled ingredients.

A GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION - Our candles are ideal for gift giving.  They can be used during all seasons therefore; they are appropriate for any holiday or special event.  Wax & Oils candles make for a fantastic gift for you and/or someone you care about or wish to inspire.
